definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: In this paper, how to construct the microelectronics specialty laboratory in non-key colleges or universities is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对非重点高校微电子学专业实验室建设进行了讨论。

sentences.english: It would be a natural evolution of microelectronics to become nanoelectronics.
sentences.chinese: 它是从微电子学到奈米电子学的自然演进。

sentences.english: The foundation of microelectronics is modern solid state physics .
sentences.chinese: 微电子学的基础是近代固体物理。

sentences.english: He has lots of original ideas about the research into microelectronics.
sentences.chinese: 他对微电子学的研究很有创见。

sentences.english: Three-dimensional microelectronics focuses on the design and fabrication technology for 3-D integrated circuits.
sentences.chinese: 三维微电子学主要研究三维集成电路的设计与制造。

pinyin: sheng1 wu4 yi1 xue2 gong1 cheng2
Xi1 an1 Dian4 zi3 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2
